article: get ready for the grand national , the highlight of the racing year , with our must-watch preview from the paddock at aintree .
sportsmail 's racing correspondent marcus townend and britain 's no 1 tipster sam turner cast their eye over the 39-strong field for the race and offer their predictions .
will ap mccoy 's glittering career conclude with a fairytale victory for favourite shutthefrontdoor , a result that would cause 70,000 spectators to raise the roof and wipe out the bookies ?
or will one of the other contenders take their place in history ? find out by clicking play on the video below .
sorry we are not currently accepting comments on this article .
abstract: daily mail racing correspondent marcus townend and tipster sam turner cast their eye over the field for the grand national in our preview video .
shutthefrontdoor and ap mccoy will start the race as favourite .
